text: Enokuba ubunokuveza yonke imiqondiso kuBantu beNcwadi bebengekhe bakulandele kwi’Kiblah yakho, ube nawe ungenakulandela i’Kiblah yabo. Kanti nabo abangekhe balandele i’Kiblah yomnye nomnye phakathi kwabo. Inene ukuba ungalandela iminqweno yabo engendawo, emva kokuba oko kululwazi sele kufikile kuwe ubuya kuba ngomnye wabagabadeli
